author: kohsuke
msg: changed the way object allocations are instrumented. we now use local variables to store arguments temporarily, to improve the performance and so that we won't require StackRecorder even if the code is running outside the continuation environment. Also added a test case for that.

author: jmitchell
msg: fix issue where resources were not being copied during the apps distribution

author: jmitchell
msg: Add some more helpful output when a message is not found from the specified bundle and locale key

author: soc-rian
msg: simplified data filter, modified header parsing to be a filter, fixed bug that didn't catch single '.' when parsing a header
